title: Compare interval width and estimate for produce

content.question: How does the 95 percent z-interval for a proportion constructed from the summer sample compare to the winter interval?

choices.label: The summer interval is wider and has a lesser point estimate.
The summer interval is wider and has a greater point estimate.
The summer interval is narrower and has a lesser point estimate.
The summer interval is narrower and has a greater point estimate.
The summer interval is the same width and has a greater point estimate.

content.answer: The summer interval is wider and has a greater point estimate.

topic.text: 6.2: Constructing a Confidence Interval for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
